pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cognitive Models // Hierarchical Bayesian models. The package provides tools to fit two popular response time models, using population-based Markov Chain Monte Carlo (pMCMC). The paper by Heathcote, Lin, Reynolds, Strickland, Gretton, and Matzke (2018, doi:10.3758/s13428-018-1067-y) describes the prototype of the package.
